summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Interlake Avenue and Ashworth Avenue, each from North 40th Street to North 41st Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains, together with five hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7548 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
